name: Renity
description:
Hey, this game is still in dev and im working all time and i promise i will make the textures better every dollar helps, if someone donate i would be happy and i will put these money to public game in play store and app store, wait for next updates!!!!

plans for next updates:

-public game for play store and app store 

-multiplayer mode (pvp and coop)

-training mode

-score counter

-accounts

-textures and effects

-settings

i dont plan making anoying ads showing everytime you die, maybye i will ad to respawn when you die 

AND MORE!!!

plase report bugs it will help a lot
